bibl.title: Postcard from Clarence P. Jones to Emilie Lawrence Reed, September 25, 1927

div1.p: Jones writes to set the date for the dedication of Belroi.

div1.head: Postcard from Clarence P. Jones to Emilie Lawrence Reed, September 25, 1927

opener.dateline:
DR. CLARENCE PORTER JONES
3117 WEST AVENUE
NEWPORT NEWS, VIRGINIA
Sep. 25 - 27

div1.p:
Your letter
received- We have in mind the
day you mentioned for the
Dedication of Belroi- The
Commission will meet Tuesday
Evening next and I shall notify
You at once. We will be
glad to invite the friends you
mention & will send you some
invitations to mail to other friends-
Please make any Suggestions
you care to do-
